thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Howes Family, London
thread.title_full: Rentalcars.com reviewed by Howes Family, London

author: Howes Family, London
title: Howes Family, London
text: We have used Rentalcars.com for car rental bookings on 4 trips to Florida over the past 2 years and have booked again through them for Easter 2017. The site offers clear, easily comparable rental prices offered by all major car rental companies covering this area and we have had a completely problem free and quality experience on every trip.
